CmdLine: adduser -D -u 1000 node     && apk add --no-cache         libstdc++     && apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps         binutils-gold         curl         g++         gcc         gnupg         libgcc         linux-headers         make         python   && for key in     9554F04D7259F04124DE6B476D5A82AC7E37093B     94AE36675C464D64BAFA68DD7434390BDBE9B9C5     0034A06D9D9B0064CE8ADF6BF1747F4AD2306D93     FD3A5288F042B6850C66B31F09FE44734EB7990E     71DCFD284A79C3B38668286BC97EC7A07EDE3FC1     DD8F2338BAE7501E3DD5AC78C273792F7D83545D     B9AE9905FFD7803F25714661B63B535A4C206CA9     C4F0DFFF4E8C1A8236409D08E73BC641CC11F4C8     56730D5401028683275BD23C23EFEFE93C4CFFFE   ; do     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key";   done     && curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz"     && curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/SHASUMS256.txt.asc"     && gpg --batch --decrypt --output SHASUMS256.txt SHASUMS256.txt.asc     && grep " node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz\$" SHASUMS256.txt | sha256sum -c -     && tar -xf "node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz"     && cd "node-v$NODE_VERSION"     && ./configure     && make -j$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)     && make install     && apk del .build-deps     && cd ..     && rm -Rf "node-v$NODE_VERSION"     && rm "node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz" SHASUMS256.txt.asc SHASUMS256.txt
Commands.Name: run
